lead_paragraph: America's hot summer of racial tension, violence and politics has spilled on to the basketball court, the track and the Twitter feeds of some of the country's top sports stars.

headline.print_headline: America's Summer of Racial Tension Surfaces on Road to Rio
headline.main: America's Summer of Racial Tension Surfaces on Road to Rio
